issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Publish Status with GRAPH API gives an Alert with Error message(#341)
and does not post anything on the Facebook wall.
Publish wall Post with GRAPH API gives an Alert with Error message (#341)
and does not post anything on the Facebook wall.

This occurs in 1.8.2 also.
screen shot of the error message is attached.

Steps to Reproduce

1: Tap on KitchenSink>MashUps>Facebook>Publish Stream

   Actual Result: Alert with Error message (#341) "Feed action request limit reached"
   Expected Result: publish a status with Appcelerator logo for Publish Status with Graph API
   and publish a wall post with a link to Mozilla MDN Javascript page.
fields.summary: Android:KitchenSink-Facebook: Publish Status and Wall post with GRAPH API fails
fields.environment:
Android : 4.0(Samsung 4g),2.2(nexus S)
Titanium SDK :2.0.0.v20120322190311
Mac Os :10.7.2

comments.body:
Tested this and was able to publish to stream without error.
I believe the error described here was caused by a API rate limit or server error.
Closing this ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
